content: fruits basket is probably the first manga i ever read which was around 2nd grade for me so safe to say this is another series engrained in my childhood 〃 ▽ 〃 tohru is one of my all time favorite characters so i wanted to make her materials needed 3 0mm crochet hook sewing needle scissors fabric glue optional black embroidery thread blue embroidery thread yarn see below yarn colors you ll need ivory brown pink blue darker blue skill level is intermediate
